title: Google Ads, Tracking & SEO Tweaks
job_overview:
Workload: ~2 hrs / day, Monday-Friday (? 40 hrs / month)
Rate: US $4 – $5 per hour (? ?230 – ?290)?|?Paid monthly via Wise
Start: Immediately

What You’ll Do Each Day
Minutes Task Tools
15 min Pull previous-day Search Terms - add negative keywords; quick bid/budget glance Google Ads
45 min Check GA4 / Looker dashboard for CPL spikes - verify UTM & gclid flow via GTM ? update Unbounce or Growform variant copy / CTAs GA4, GTM, Looker, Unbounce, Growform
30 min Light on-page SEO edits (titles, meta, internal links) or schedule 1–2 short social posts based on campaign wins WordPress/Webflow, Search Console, Canva
Weekly (15 min) Join sync call; suggest next tests & quick wins Slack, Zoom

Must-Have Skills
Hands-on Google Ads & negative-keyword management (1 yr+)

Solid UTM tagging + gclid ? GA4 tracking experience

Basic Unbounce (or similar) landing-page edits & A/B test setup

Fundamental on-page SEO (meta tags, Search Console)

Clear written English for concise reporting and social captions

Self-starter: can spot issues and propose fixes without micro-management

Nice-to-Haves
Familiarity with Growform forms

Canva / basic graphic design

Real-estate lead-gen background

Schedule & Culture
Log in before 10 a.m. U.S. EST for daily Ads check (that’s 10 p.m. PH-time cut-off).

Otherwise work any PH daytime hours you prefer.

Data-driven, feedback-friendly environment; quick Slack comms, documented SOPs.
